International Mental Health Week

AGH University of Krakow cordially invites all international students, postgraduates and academics to participate in International Mental Health Week, which will take place from 13-17 January 2025. This special week is dedicated to raising awareness of mental health, promoting well-being and equipping you with practical tools to manage stress and thrive in your academic and personal life.

fot. Paweł Strzałkowski

Stress management workshop – 17 January 2025

One of the highlights of the week is the stress management workshop, scheduled for 17 January 2025. This workshop aims to help you:

Identify sources of stress in your daily life

Learn evidence-based techniques to manage and reduce stress

Build resilience and maintain balance during challenging times

The workshop will be led by experienced mental health professionals in a supportive and welcoming environment, making it an excellent opportunity for both personal development and community building.

fot. Grzegorz Wojtek

Why take part?

Connect with other international students and staff who understand the unique challenges of living and studying abroad

Learn practical strategies for maintaining mental wellbeing and coping with academic pressures

Celebrate the diversity of our academic community by focusing on shared experiences and mutual support

How to join?

Complete the recruitment form: 
https://forms.office.com/e/4XdLv67e7W

Applications close on 
Friday, 13 December 2024.
